answers.answer: I have hypothyrodism and it is pretty bad. I take a high dosage of Synthroid every morning and I am now pregnant. I have two sons already and all this with a problematic thyroid and diabetes. It will happen hun! Just breath and relax. I found after I quit trying is when it always happened for me and I think that is because the stress of trying was gone. Good luck!!

I have hypothyroidism too and I got pregnant.  My baby is 3 months old.  So, yes your thyroid will let you.  Thyroid medications can make birth control not work.  My thyroid doctor says alot of her patients accidently get pregnant.

question: I want to get pregnant but i don't know if my thyroid will let it happen
title: trying to get pregnent with a thyroid
